Title: Windows 8 Accelerator
Description: A set of components and controls to accelerate your Windows 8 and Windows Phone 8 application development.
HomeWiki:
DISCLAIMER: This is not a Microsoft official SDK and there are no guarantees. Use it at your own risk. It's a set of sample components that provides one different approach to implement common Windows 8 and Windows Phone 8 features.

Project Description
A set of components and controls to accelerate your Windows 8 and Windows Phone 8 application development.

Download
Please use Nuget to get the latest version.
http://nuget.org/packages/Windows8Accelerator
